com.risk.team.services

Class RiskMapRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.team.services.RiskMapRW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskMapRW
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Map Input Output to read the contents from an existing map or to create a new Map for the game.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil, Dhaval Desai
    See Also:
